PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-19522008-12-19,  ,  ,  TC,  CAN POST, 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE LETTER MAIL REGULATIONS, effective January 12, 2009, will establish the rate of postage for domestic letter mail items for 2009. This will ensure that postal costs remain trasparent and predictable for Canadians and Canadian businesses and will help provide Canada Post with the financial means it needs to meet its various obligations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0005 Publication Date: 2009-01-07
